pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw: I'm still getting a bit confused when changing the settings. If it's too much trouble now, maybe in the future we can disable fields which shouldn't be used in a certain configuration. For example, disable `inherit_yaw` unless both `static` and `relative` are checked.
content.html: I'm still getting a bit confused when changing the settings. If it's too much trouble now, maybe in the future we can disable fields which shouldn't be used in a certain configuration. For example, disable inherit_yaw unless both static and relative are checked.
